title: Creatify – A Creative Artwork Showcase Platform
description: A modern platform for artists to upload, explore, and showcase artwork with full CRUD and a clean UI.
fullDescription: Creatify is a modern online platform where artists can upload, explore, and showcase their creative artworks. It provides a beautiful, minimal UI for discovering art, connecting with creators, and curating personal favorites.
features: Explore & Showcase Art: Browse artworks shared by other creators and upload your own.
Favorites System: Add or remove artworks from your personalized favorites gallery.
Secure Authentication: Firebase Email/Password & Google Login with real-time user session.
Full CRUD Support: Add, update, or delete your uploaded artworks easily.
Theme Toggle: Switch between Dark and Light modes with localStorage persistence.
Animations & UI: Smooth transitions using React Awesome Reveal & React Simple Typewriter.
Search & Filter: Quickly find artworks by title, artist, or category.
Like System: Express appreciation by liking artworks (MongoDB $inc for like count).
Responsive Design: Fully optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop users.
architecture: Animations: Motion, React Awesome Reveal, React Simple Typewriter
UI Components: React Icons, React Toastify, React Spinners
gettingStarted: Set up environment variables: Create a .env file and add Firebase config
Start the development server: npm run dev

title: Next-Ecommerce – Modern E-Commerce Platform
description: A Next.js e-commerce application with separate Express + MongoDB backend, authentication, and admin panel.
fullDescription: A modern, responsive e-commerce web application built with Next.js 16 (App Router), featuring a complete shopping experience with product management, authentication, and a beautifully designed UI following industry standards.
features: Product Catalog: Browse products with high-quality images, detailed descriptions, and pricing
Advanced Search & Filtering: Search by name with real-time highlighting, filter by category and price range
Wishlist System: Save favorite items for later purchase
Shopping Cart: Add items, manage quantities, and proceed to checkout
NextAuth.js Integration: Secure authentication with credentials and OAuth
Admin Dashboard: Manage product inventory with an intuitive interface
Image Upload: Support for product images via URL
Dark Mode Ready: CSS variable-based theming system
Mobile Optimized: Touch-friendly interfaces and responsive layouts
architecture: Styling: Tailwind CSS v4 with custom configuration
Authentication: NextAuth.js with credentials and OAuth providers
gettingStarted: Run the development server: npm run dev

title: GameHub – Indie Games Platform
description: GameHub is a modern web app designed to help users explore, discover, and interact with their favorite games.
fullDescription: GameHub is a modern web app designed to help users explore, discover, and interact with their favorite games. It provides a smooth user experience with authentication, game browsing, and responsive design — built using React and Tailwind CSS.
features: User Authentication: Sign in with Email & Password, Google Auth, Forgot Password.
Modern UI/UX: Fully responsive layout, Clean and interactive design, Smooth animations.
Game Library: Browse popular games, Interactive cards and hover effects.
Optimized Development Setup: Vite for fast builds, Reusable components, Global Error Boundary, SEO Optimized.
gettingStarted: Set up Environment Variables: Create .env file with Firebase config
Run the development server: npm run dev
Build for production: npm run build
